title: So i decided to go on my smurf, the runes were bad so i decided to go buy some but then...
body:
I was outraged by the price, it had been a very long time since i had looked at the price for runes since my main account has pretty much everything, 820 for cdr runes? 420 for a bunch of others? This is ridiculous, had 4k ip but still couldn't buy a full set of glyphs, i cant believe how bad this is, i feel sorry for new players because this is just stupid, runes should not cost that much at all.

Why on earth after like 5 years are rune prices still so high?

replies.body:
It's teaching real life things. You can either spend all your money on cool things (lots of champions) or you can be dedicated and save it for things that will really matter and help you out (runes) 

They are also the only things that can't be brought with RP to make it fair to those who don't spend actual money on the game. This is why you spam double ip weekends, for the runes.
They're outrageously overpriced though. The average game is about 80ip, and rune pages can be north of 20,000....

yeah runes are way too expensive, especially for how much IP you get. lets say a standard quint is 1k ip, you need to play like 8 games to get one, and you need 3 of them, that's 24 games. then you have marks, blues, and yellows as well.
The thing that really gets me about runes every time is the tiers it is a waste of time haha There is no point to tier 1 and 2 all it does it trick new players
tfw having a full 20 pages decked out

t1 runes are 50% as effective as t3 for 1/10 the cost mind u some stats only appear in t3 runes
either way i have full sets of all runes so meh

It's an IP sink. They **need** to be expensive so they take a long time to fill out.

If they were cheaper you would buy *everything* much quicker and run out of a use for IP.

I had the same issue. It takes a long time to make pages, but that's because it's meant to.

It sucks, but it's a part of the design.

Some quints, that are essential on some champs, are 2050 IP or something...

It's ridiculous.
Yes they are expensive, but ive had no trouble getting 2 rune pages easily when i reach lvl 30 on smurfs
Yeah I still don't have AP rune page :(

Runes are expensive: yes
Are they ever going to come down: No
Are runes really needed: When in ranked, be prepared

Basically wat im trying to say, is that runes are expensive yea, but for me i think it's worth it
Personally ^

And there's me.

Has 2049 RP.

And trying to buy some quint runes.

...
I spent over 10,000 IP on my first rune page. Never spent that much on my 2nd because I used the same Seals and Glyphs.
My Shen rune page comes to an approximate total of 22k last I checked.
